Text.val: 17.10.2011 SH SCR16806 Removed call of GB722 (turn job to MSGW) in case no document was retreived from Radiant

STP.TXT: At least on parameter is empty

Text.val: -- Prepare path where PDF files have to be copied to
-- Retrieve PDF file from Radiant archive
-- For the moment there exists no detailed error handling, in case of at least
one error the job turns to MSGW
-- Copy PDF file to IFS (later on files will be copied to CD-ROM manually)

ExpSyntax.val: 'UFB558RA was not able to generate and fill base64 encoded image data. (Errorcode = '&Trim (Str ({0,10},'N9'))
